Name: Dark Side of War
About the game: Dark Side of War - is a classic 3D shooter with hardcore elements where you are a single soldier fighting in the enemy rear. 1942 year. It is the peak of the Great Patriotic War. You are a lonely soldier and go the enemy rear. Just you and your soldier’s skills! The main aim is to clean one of the enemy’s bases and possibly survive. Look for ammos, kill enemies, make right decisions. Only then you will be able to win in the war. Be careful! Remember you have the only life for ending the mission. This is the key fact which differs the game from other similar ones. Go ahead! GAME FEATURES: · Classic gameplay of the ninetieths; · Various levels with unique design; · Hardcore gameplay, every patron is important; · Special soundtracks;
